info.title: ezyshield Management API
info.description: API for the management of the organization and its workspaces.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: The number of results that will be returned per page.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: The page number to start the pagination from.

path.description: Base path for paginator generated URLs.

per_page.description: Number of items shown per page.

to.description: Number of the last item in the slice.

total.description: Total number of items being paginated.

post.description:
The plain text token is only returned once and should be stored securely.

Requires the `admin_key:write` ability.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Available sorts are `name`. You can sort by multiple options by separating them with a comma. To sort in descending order, use `-` sign in front of the sort, for example: `-name`.
